resources.string: There are problems with the security certificate for this site.
This certificate isn\'t from a trusted authority.
The name of the site doesn\'t match the name on the certificate.
This certificate has an invalid date.
Show Search Bar in Notification Panel
Some sites require cookies to login or display normal.
Override a website\'s request to control zoom behavior
Format webpages to fit the screen
Allow the browser to remember passwords, saved forms, etc.

string-array.name: pref_clear_data_descriptions
string-array.item: Clear locally cached contents and databases
Clear all saved accounts and passwords
Cancel permission to all websites to obtain your location

resources.string: Adjust size of text and fonts
Fill out web forms with a single touch
Allow sites to save and read cookie data
Allow sites to request access to your location
Remember the data I entered in the form
Save usernames and passwords for websites
Show warning if there\'s a problem with a site\'s security

The page you\'re trying to view contains data that has already been submitted (\"POSTDATA\"). If you resend the data, any action the form on the page carried out (such as a search or online purchase) will be repeated.
Can\'t open a new tab until you close one.
Only one pop-up can be open at a time.
An SD card is required to download %s.
The SD card is busy. To allow downloads, touch Turn Off USB Storage in the notification.
This site can access your location. Change this on the Settings > Advanced > Website Settings.
This site cannot access your location. Change this on the Settings > Advanced > Website Settings.
Cancel permission to obtain your location
This site can currently access your location
This site can\'t currently access your location
Clear location access for this website?
Please describe your opinion or suggestion in words... (1000 words)
We have received your comments and suggestions, thank you.
Submission failed due to network issue, please check.
Please enter no more than %1$d characters

Pages that were last accessed have been restored.
No static websites, Click to Add
Blink is based on open source projects: AOSP Browser and Chromium,\n and committed to providing users with the ultimate browsing experience.
